system.description: This spell functions like command, except that up to one creature per level may be affected, and the subjects continue to obey the command for 1 round per level. Greater command affects only creatures with 7 or fewer HD. You can issue one of the following commands and the subjects obey to the best of their ability: Approach, Drop, Fall, Flee, Halt, or any one-word command you choose. If the subject cannot carry out the command on its turn, it does nothing.
system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
